description:
Dive into the Halloween spirit with our latest addition featuring 24 chilling 3D models that are perfect for the season. You can now bring the magic of Halloween to life in vibrant colors!

But that's not all! We've also conjured up 5 special sticker packs to give your creations that extra touch of Halloween magic. Trick or treat your way through bats, pumpkins, ghosts, witches, and more.

Don't miss out on this ghoulishly good DLC! Start painting your Halloween masterpiece today.
name: Paint It: Spooky Pack
